articles.title: Americans will feel impact of immigration enforcement on farms, union president warns - NPR
articles.description: Workers are "terrified" as immigration agents sweep farms, the president of United Farm Workers says, adding that Americans should think about the "human loss" as well as "crops rotting" in the fields
articles.content: As immigration enforcement ramps up, the head of the United Farm Workers (UFW) union says agriculture workers across the country are afraid to show up for work and warned that fear could impact house… [+6158 chars]
